h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Do not be lured in by this gesture, as it's all an act -- as he'll eventually look up and use his tail to bring the blade up in an upward slash with a projectile slice at you!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Do not be lured in by this gesture, as it's all an act -- as he'll eventually look up and use his tail to bring the blade up in an upward slash with a projectile slice at you!
